name: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS
install_build_deps: sudo apt-get install -y rpm ccache cmake g++ pkg-config zlib1g-dev git python-dev libacl1-dev ninja-build manpages-dev capnproto libcapnp-dev gdb lldb python3-pexpect
install_app_test_deps: sudo apt-get install -y tightvncserver xtightvncviewer curl tar bzip2 libdbus-glib-1-2 libreoffice
